page.title: 13MARKET GARDENING IN ALKHAM.
page.content: To the south west of Alkham lies Upton Farm in the hamlet of South Alkham.The farm has developed into quite a large farm shop selling both produce fresh from the fields and that which has been brought into the area.Strawberries,raspberries and blackcurrants are grown and during the harvesting season the fields are open for "pick your own".Part-time pickers are also employed during the picking season.They also sell eggs which are free range from their own farm and this year they had a stall at the County Show at Detling near Maidstone. Mr.W.Wenham,the milkman and general grocery deliverer,also sell their eggs on his rounds.The shop which is open 7 days a week also sells jams,sweets, ice-creams, gifts, pot plants, bedding plants and stone garden furniture.
